Про меня

Hi, I am a Fullstack JavaScript developer. My work experience is 2 yeas⏳.
While working on the project I study new technologies 📚 and discuss in detail the terms of reference 📞.
While working on the development I stick to the modern best practices 👌, using code linters and leave comments to achieve the maximum quality of code 👍.
I develop web applications and layout of any complexity. ⚓
🔥🔥🔥 I provide absolutely free advice on web development 🔥🔥🔥.
Just write to me.

Верстка

Adaptive, cross-browser-based layout (design) in highly optimized HTML CSS JS code.
In the layout of the site I maintain high quality code thanks to css and js printers, which are follow the beauty and elegance of the code.
Considering all this my code is easy to support and refractor.
When assembling a project, the code of the image and all the components of the project pass through the compression stage. optimization, which allows for fast page loading speed

Back-end development

Back-end development using Node Js platform together with Express Js framework,
I can make an ordinary MVC site with template rendering (using ejs).
REST api for Front-end application and real-time communication (for example chat) using Web sockets and socket.io

Single Page Applications

Single-page applications using VueJS, VueX and Vue router. Connection to your own api and integration with third-party services.
SRR (Server Side Rendering) is implemented using Nuxt Js

Parsing data from websites

Parsing data from websites, saving the information received in your databases, in Excel documents or json files.
